text: On September 25, 2018 I take a lecture entitled "Morphological and EMG functional dental diagnosis" at the Congress "Innovative technologies of functional diagnosis in dentistry" organized by the Russian Dental Association. A special thanks to the invitation to Prof. Elena Ivanova, Friend and Colleague for several years.

On 26 September 2018 together with my father Francesco we take a lecture entitled "Masticatory muscles function instrumental evaluation: research protocol and everyday dental procedures" to the students of the II level Master in Implantology and Advanced Surgery held at the University of Cagliari. Thanks for the invitation and the organization to the Colleagues Massimiliano Ciaravolo and Nazario Russo.

On April 14, 2018, at the beautiful venue of Villa Fenaroli - Rezzato (Brescia) I exhibited a scientific paper entitled "A preliminary reliability test of trans-illumination dental occlusion measurement" made together with colleagues Sofia Masin, Dorotea Scantamburlo, Redento Peretta and Claudia Dellavia. Thanks to my Friend Ivan Lendaro for the invitation and the organization.

On 13 and 14 October 2017 in Bergamo, in collaboration with my father and colleagues Claudia Dellavia, Federica Musto and Redento Peretta, I held a specialist course for colleagues on the clinical procedures, techniques and theoretical principles of the application of the surface electromyography masticatory muscles.A special thanks to the co-spekers and the organizing committe for the success of the event.

At the Annual Congress of the European Prosthodontic Association titled "Current concepts and paradigms shift in prosthodontics" held in Bucharest (Romania) from 28 to 30 September 2017 I presented a poster titled "Simplified VDO determination through ssEMG". Thanks tothe co-authors of the work and the organizing committee of the event.

At the III National Congress GSDI Study Group of the Italian temporomandibular disorders, coordinated by the Collegue Daniele Manfredini, three works in which I participated were exhibited.
* ssEMG reliability during saliva swallowing. Riccardo Rosati, Federica Musto, Giacomo Begnoni, Guia Carola Guenza, Natalie Khomchyna, Claudia Bruna Dellavia.
* Three-dimensional VDO determination using Vertical Tester and ssEMG. Redento Peretta, Francesco Rosati, Riccardo Rosati, Federica Musto, Claudia Dellavia.
* Correlation between indexes of jaw muscles' function and dental-skeletal morphology. Francesca Vozzi, Redento Peretta, Riccardo Rosati, Luca Guarda-Nardini,Daniele Manfredini.

Guest of Prof. Luca Guarda Nardini in the prestigious Università degli Studi of Padua room at Treviso Hospital I participated in the coordination of a multicentric research project. A team of Professionist will analyze a group of patients with pain in the mandibular joint to deepen the knowledge about this often disabling disorder.

Together with Colleagues Federica Musto, Chiarella Sforza, Marilisa Toma and Claudia Dellavia we published an article in the renowned Journal of Electromyography and Kinesiology, official publication of the International Society of Electrophysiology and Kinesiology. The articles entitled "Standardised surface electromyography allows effective submental muscles assessment" describes the development and quantify the repeatabilityof a method for measuring the activity of the oral floor muscles. The first application of this protocol will be the evaluation of the swallowing coordination

In the prestigious "Diocesan Museum of San Gregorio Barbarigo" I lectured to the "11th Conference of pain management and palliative care centers in Triveneto" organized by the University of Padua. A thank to the inviting Colleague Roberto Saia.

The journal http://www.stomaeduj.com/ published at the link http://www.stomaeduj.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/art-Riccardo-Rosati.pdf the result of research collaboration that I coordinated between the Università degli Studi di Milano, the North-Western State Medical University in St. Petersburg (Russia) and the Moscow State University in Moscow (Russia). Thanks to the co-authors of the study, Dr. Ekaterina Semelewa, Prof. Elena Satygo, Prof. Elena P. Ivanova, my father Francesco Rosati, Professor Alexey Silin and Prof. Virgilio F. Ferrario.

In the wonderful context of Fenaroli Palace in Brescia, I lectured to XX National Congress of Eurocclusion Scientific Society togheter with my father Francesco. An heartfelt thanks to the scientific organizer Doctor Ivan Lendaro.
In this article, written togheter with the Colleagues Federica Musto and Claudia Dellavia, the subject of management of dental occlusion in order to plan reliable dental rehabilitations is debated.

In this article, published on Aesthetic Plastic Surgery Journal (printing of European Association of Plastic Surgery Scientific Societies, EASAPS), morphology of lips is evaluated and anathomical features typical of men and women and different-aged subjects are individuated.

This video, realized togheter with Colleagues Claudia Dellavia, Federica Musto and Guia Carola Guenza, illustrates the correct procedures to make an analysis of masticatory function with the aid of surface electromyography; it furnishes reliable quantitative data only if it has managed with standardized protocols, which reduce to minimum biological and technical factors of variability. The shot of operative steps has spaced out by the presentation of scientific articles, that support the illustrated sequences and for a further in-depth analysis of anathomic and phisyiologic concepts.

In this course dedicated to the Professional in the field, in collaboration with my father and the Colleagues Claudia Dellavia, Federica Musto and Redento Peretta, clinical and technical procedures and the theorical principles of application of surface electromyography of masticatory muscles are illustrated.

In this video, realized togheter with the Colleagues Federica Musto and Claudia Dellavia, the main steps for a correct positioning of splint are presented. A first check on the adapting and stability of manufacter and then of position and number of occlusal contacts has been made. How to make a possible occlusal adjustment is so described.

In this video, planned and realized with my father Francesco and with the Colleagues Federica Musto and Claudia Dellavia, the steps made for manufactering an occlusal splint in a Lab are illustrated. It focuses on aspects which aid the Clinician to manage the device.

In this video, planned and realize togheter with the Colleagues Federica Musto and Claudia Dellavia, the initial steps of dental treatment with occlusal spint in patients with a healthy stomatognatic apparatus are described.
